channel.title: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man
channel.description: Wouldn't it be cool to be the misterious guy of the whole incident? You would follow gordon arownd, giving eli the testing material, being with Dr. Kliener on the tram into sector c, it would be a very different perspective of Half-Life

item.title: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man
item.dc:creator: Chevelle19V
item.description:
headcrab77:

There already is:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JaJ1fDdMJsg

https://www.moddb.com/mods/g-man-invasion

Oh man, that’s awesome.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man

item.title: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man
item.dc:creator: James.Curse
item.description:
I heard that valve at some point considered making a game about a young g-man but scrapped the idea shortly after (no wonder why). It was back then when they were not so serious about the plot and gearbox developed new games in the half-life franchise.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man

item.source: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man

item.title: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
λdam:

No. Seriously, no. The Gman is such a mysterious character, that’s what makes him the Gman. Besides, it would be an empty mod, you’d have to make stuff up, and that would ruin the character.

Agreed. Me and a bunch of friends actually considered making a GoldSrc mod for this, but we scrapped the whole thing shortly. There’s too much stuff we don’t know about the G-man, and I doubt we ever will know more.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man
item.dc:creator: o_herrow
item.description:
How would that even be fun? Getting to stand around and watch other NPC’s shoot things, then noclipping away when they get too close?

item.title: Half-Life Mod Where You Play As G-Man
item.dc:creator: Jelly_Croissant
item.description:
I agree. The mod would be boring. The game would just be missions like. Stand. Stare. Stop. Walk Right. Stop. Stand some more. Now wheres the fun in that?

Read full topic
